titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Martha L. DeCamp papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Member of the class of 1957 of University High School, Ann Arbor, Michigan. She had previously attended St. Thomas High School.
archdesc.scopecontent: Scrapbook, 1946-1951, containing clippings, minutes, photographs, and memorabilia relating to the activities of Girl Scout Troop #3, St. Thomas School, Ann Arbor, Mich.; also loose items from a scrapbook; also material relating to the 50th class reunion of the class of 1957 of St. Thomas High School and of University High School.

corpname.primary_name: Girl Scouts of the United States of America
St. Thomas High School (Ann Arbor, Mich.)
